home.name: Jang Jonghyun
home.description: I'm a web development expert using Next.js, TypeScript, and React. I create web applications that prioritize user experience.

hero.name: Noah Jang
hero.description: I'm a web developer specializing in Next.js, TypeScript, and React. I create web applications that prioritize user experience.

footer.description: A space where I study both Frontend and Backend environments. I grow by studying and documenting various aspects of web development.

about.title: About
about.greeting: Hello, I'm a developer with 3 years of experience
about.intro1: As a passionate full-stack developer, I love building user-centric web applications. I mainly use Next.js, React, and TypeScript, and always explore the latest web technology trends.
about.intro2: I focus on solving complex problems and improving user experience. I value clean code and modern web standards, and strive to become a better developer through continuous learning and growth.
about.career1Desc: Participated in a project to convert an existing JSP-based ERP system to a React & Spring Boot-based system at a leading domestic construction ERP solution company. Improved maintainability and scalability by handling HR/Payroll and labor management modules.
about.career2Desc: Refactored the purchasing program for the SELL-UP service, a digital solution for Dongdaemun fashion business professionals. The platform supports integrated management for sellers, purchasing managers, and wholesale/retail businesses.
about.education1Desc: Majored in Chinese at Dongseo University from 2011 to 2018, gaining not only language skills but also an understanding of Chinese culture and communication.

project1.title: First Step Korea
project1.description: A web application providing life information in Korea for foreigners.

project2.title: Lost Ark Community
project2.description: A community application for Lost Ark users.

project3.title: Dungeon & Fighter Community
project3.description: A community application for Dungeon & Fighter users.

services.title: My broad
services.description: From construction ERP solution development to web application development, I provide various services. I help achieve business goals through efficient and scalable systems.

services.title: ERP System Development
services.description: I develop ERP systems optimized for construction business processes. I integrate various modules such as HR/payroll, labor management, and project management to support efficient business operations.

services.title: Web Application Development
services.description: I develop modern web applications using React, Next.js, and TypeScript. I provide user-friendly interfaces and excellent performance.

services.title: System Integration
services.description: I migrate legacy systems to modern technology stacks and implement integration between various systems. I optimize data flow through API development and integration.

services.title: Database Design & Management
services.description: I provide efficient database schema design and optimization. I improve system performance through large-scale data processing and complex query optimization.

services.title: System Maintenance & Optimization
services.description: I provide ongoing maintenance and performance optimization for existing systems. I improve system stability and scalability through code refactoring, bug fixes, and feature enhancements.

services.getInTouchDescription: Need construction ERP solution development or web application development? Get in touch with me, there is a high chance that I will be able to help!
